brief_title: Age-Related Changes in Stress Hormone Regulation
brief_summary: Studies investigating physiological processes involved in aging-related deficits in regulation of stress hormone systems.
criteria: Exclusion Criteria: - History of major psychiatric disorders, - Neurologic disorder affecting cognitive function, - Unstable medical problems, - Medications including antidepressants, neuroleptics, anxiolytics, CNS stimulants, narcotic analgesics, anti-convulsants, - Drugs effecting HPA axis function, - Vision and hearing deficits, - Undergoing major life event within one month or - Loss of family member within 6 months.
